T02D3727:54b-1: tri samba ra pra bh'a m'a l'a n'a ma /
T02D3727:54b-3: sdom gsum 'od kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T02D3727:54b-4: bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3727:54b-5: rnam dag zab yangs shes bya'i rgya mtsho las //
T02D3727:54b-6: bstan pa'i gru dang bdag blo'i ded dpon gyis //
T02D3727:54b-7: mkhyen ba'i dar 'phyar brtse ba'i rlung bskyod nas //
T02D3727:54b-8: sdom gsum yid bzhin nor bu kho bos blang //
T02D3727:54b-9: ding sang bstan pa'i gsham 'di ru //
T02D3727:54b-10: sdom pa gsum gyi rnam gzhag la //
T02D3727:54b-11: mkhas pa'i rgyu skar 'ba' zhig gis //
T02D3727:54b-12: phyogs re'i cha tsam rtogs 'gyur mod //
T02D3727:54b-13: so sor thar dang byang chub sems//
T02D3727:54b-14: rig 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa la //
T02D3727:54b-15: 'thob tshul gnas tshul gtong ba'i tshul //
T02D3727:54b-16: gnyis ldan gsum ldan 'thad pa'i gzhung //
T02D3727:54b-17: nyes pa phan yon rim pa dag //
T02D3727:54b-18: bdag blo nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D3727:54b-19: phyogs las rgyal bar byas te dgod //
T02D3727:54b-20: gling gsum skyes pa bud med kyis //
T02D3727:54b-21: rang nyid 'khor ba bsgral don du //
T02D3727:54b-22: mkhan slob cho ga chad ldan las //
T02D3727:54b-23: ji srid 'tsho yi bar dag tu //
T02D3727:54b-24: gnod pa bzhi dang bcas pa las //
T02D3727:54b-25: gtso cher lus ngag sdom pa de //
T02D3727:54b-26: nyan thos bye brag smra ba'i sdom //
T02D3727:54b-27: gang zag glang bu 'dra ba la //
T02D3727:54b-28: sdom pa khal dang 'dra ba zhig / thob pa'i thag pas sbrel bas na //
T02D3727:54b-29: so sor thar pa'i gnas tshul yin //
T02D3727:54b-30: bslab pa phul dang shi 'phos dang //
T02D3727:54b-31: mtshan gnyis dag ni byung ba dang //
T02D3727:54b-32: rtsa ba chad dang mtshan 'das las //
T02D3727:54b-33: so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba gtang //
T02D3727:54b-34: gsungs so pham pa spyad pas kyang //
T02D3727:54b-35: so sor thar pa'i tshul yin no //
T02D3727:54b-36: lha mi la sogs gang rung gis //
T02D3727:54b-37: 'gro ba ma lus bskyab pa'i phyir //
T02D3727:54b-38: slob dpon chog ga tshad ldan las //
T02D3727:54b-39: ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar //
T02D3727:54b-40: smon dang 'jug pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02D3727:54b-41: lus ngag yid gsum rang don dang //
T02D3727:54b-42: gzhan don thabs ma yin las sdom //
T02D3727:55a-2: de nyid snang la rang bzhin med //
T02D3727:55a-3: 'jigs sogs bzhin du goms pa las //
T02D3727:55a-4: yul dang yul can gnyis las grol //
T02D3727:55a-5: don dam byang chub sems yin no //
T02D3727:55a-6: sems dang sems byung sems bskyed gnyis //
T02D3727:55a-7: rang don gza' dang bral bas na //
T02D3727:55a-8: nyi ma dang ni 'od zer bzhin //
T02D3727:55a-9: de dag gnas pa'i tshul yin no //
T02D3727:55a-10: rang don blangs dang nag po yi //
T02D3727:55a-11: chos bzhi la sogs zhugs pa dang //
T02D3727:55a-12: 'bras bu dag ni thob pa na //
T02D3727:55a-13: tsha grang grub bzhin sems bskyed gtong //
T02D3727:55a-14: rigs bzhi la sogs bsod nams ldan //
T02D3727:55a-15: rang gzhan dgos 'dod phun tshogs don //
T02D3727:55a-16: bla ma cho ga tshad ldan las //
T02D3727:55a-17: nam mkha' ji srid gnas bar du //
T02D3727:55a-18: lhan skyes ye shes brda don sprod //
T02D3727:55a-19: rnam rtog dri ma kun las sdom //
T02D3727:55a-21: sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal mtshan la //
T02D3727:55a-22: rim gnyis yid bzhin nor gyis spras //
T02D3727:55a-23: 'dod yon lnga yis kun nas mchod //
T02D3727:55a-25: rig 'dzin sdom pa'i gnas tshul yin //
T02D3727:55a-27: dpag bsam shing bu 'gyel ba ltar //
T02D3727:55a-28: rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung ba na //
T02D3727:55a-29: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa gtong //
T02D3727:55a-30: rgyud ni sum brgya pa las ni //
T02D3727:55a-31: 'khor bzhi po la rjes su gnang //
T02D3727:55a-32: rang gi bslab pa dang yang ldan //
T02D3727:55a-33: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa bya //
T02D3727:55a-34: gsungs so dus kyi 'khor lo las //
T02D3727:55a-35: rten ni gsum las dge slong mchog /'bring ni dge tshul yin par 'dod //
T02D3727:55a-36: khyim na gnas pa tha ma'o //
T02D3727:55a-37: gzhan yang rdo rje rtse mo las //
T02D3727:55a-38: gal te de ni rab byung na //
T02D3727:55a-39: sdom pa gsum dang yang dag ldan //
T02D3727:55a-40: so sor thar dang byang chub sems //
T02D3727:55a-43: rdo yi rigs kyi bye brag bzhu //
T02D3727:55a-44: lcags dang zangs dang dngul du 'byung //
T02D3727:55a-45: gser 'gyur rtsi yi dngos po yis ;
T02D3727:55a-46: / kun kyang gser du 'gyur ba bzhin //
T02D3727:55a-47: de bzhin sems kyi bye brag gis //
T02D3727:55a-48: rigs can gsum gyi sdom pa yang //
T02D3727:55a-51: gsungs pa'i don la 'ga' zhig ni //
T02D3727:55b-0: sdom gsum gnas gyur ngo bo gcig / gong @55b ma'i rtsa ltung byung ba na //
T02D3727:55b-1: 'og ma gtong zhes sgrogs pa yod //
T02D3727:55b-2: de la cung zhig brtag par bya //
T02D3727:55b-3: gsum ldan gsungs pa'i dgongs pa'i don //
T02D3727:55b-4: gcig ldan spong ba'i dgongs pa min //
T02D3727:55b-5: rigs pas kyang ni shin tu gnod //
T02D3727:55b-6: bud med la smod ltung ba yis //
T02D3727:55b-7: reg srung sdom pa gtong ngam ci //
T02D3727:55b-8: gal te gtong na ha cang thal //
T02D3727:55b-9: mkha' la sprin chen 'khrigs pa yis //
T02D3727:55b-10: sa yi lo tog skam zhes bsgre //
T02D3727:55b-11: gzhan yang sdom pa gtong thob rgyu //
T02D3727:55b-12: sangs rgyas gsung las gzhan pa yi //
T02D3727:55b-13: cho ga mkhan du byed rigs sam //
T02D3727:55b-14: gzhan yang 'gal ba ltag sprod la //
T02D3727:55b-15: gnas gyur brtsi ba'i rigs ma yin //
T02D3727:55b-17: gangg'a'i chu las gyur zhes bsgre //
T02D3727:55b-18: des na rang gis brtags la blang //
T02D3727:55b-19: sdom gsum ldan zhes gsungs pa de //
T02D3727:55b-20: shes rgyud gcig la brtsi na ni //
T02D3727:55b-22: ldan chos rdzas gzhan tha dad phyir //
T02D3727:55b-23: 'on te snga phyi la brtsi na //
T02D3727:55b-24: gsum ldan zhes pa'i sgra don med //
T02D3727:55b-25: 'on te sdom gsum rdzas gcig tu //
T02D3727:55b-26: shes rgyud gcig la ldan zhe na //
T02D3727:55b-27: gtong thob cho ga gcig tu 'gyur //
T02D3727:55b-28: des na so sor thar ldan pas //
T02D3727:55b-29: byang chub mchog gi sems blangs na //
T02D3727:55b-30: dang po de ni kun gzhi la //
T02D3727:55b-31: bag la nyal ba'i tshul du gnas //
T02D3727:55b-32: rig 'dzin sdom pa thob pa na //
T02D3727:55b-33: 'og ma gnyis ka bag la nyal //
T02D3727:55b-34: dper na mkha' la skar ma shar //
T02D3727:55b-35: cung zad snang bar byas gyur mod //
T02D3727:55b-36: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba'i tshe //
T02D3727:55b-38: rta bdun tsha zer byung ba na //
T02D3727:55b-40: gal te rig pa 'dzin pa yis //
T02D3727:55b-41: gdul bya gang la gang don du //
T02D3727:55b-42: 'og ma'i sdom pa blangs pa na //
T02D3727:55b-43: gong ma zil gyis mi non mod //
T02D3727:55b-44: sdom pa cho gas 'thob pa yin //
T02D3727:55b-45: mkha' la nyi ma gnas gyur mod //
T02D3727:55b-47: des thob tshul dang gtong ba'i tshul //
T02D3727:55b-48: rang rang chog bzhin du gnas //
T02D3727:55b-49: kun gzhi bag chags mang po can //
T02D3727:55b-50: yin yang shes rgyud tha dad med //
T02D3727:55b-51: 'og ma'i lhung ba byung gyur mod //
T02D3727:55b-52: gong ma ji srid gnas kyi bar //
T02D3727:55b-53: rnam par smin pas gos pa med //
T02D3727:55b-54: dper na zla skar nub gyur mod //
T02D3727:56a-2: cung zad 'grib par byas pa med //
T02D3727:56a-3: gong ma'i ltung ba byung ba na //
T02D3727:56a-4: 'og ma ji ltar gnas gyur kyang //
T02D3727:56a-5: cung zad phan gyi skyob mi nus //
T02D3727:56a-6: rta bdun tsha zer nub pa na //
T02D3727:56a-7: zla skar gnas kyang mun pa'i bag / gser 'gyur rtsi zhes gsungs pa'i don //
T02D3727:56a-8: zil gnon yon tan mchog la dgongs //
T02D3727:56a-9: zla skar gnyis kyi 'od zer yang //
T02D3727:56a-10: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas kyi bar //
T02D3727:56a-11: nyi ma'i 'od ces kun gyis sgrogs //
T02D3727:56a-12: gzhan yang kha cig sdom pa gsum //
T02D3727:56a-13: sa chu gru 'dra gzhi rten du //
T02D3727:56a-15: de yi 'khrul gzhi kho bos bstan //
T02D3727:56a-16: mkhas pa chen po rta dbyangs dang //
T02D3727:56a-17: slob dpon sgeg ba'i rdo rje sogs //
T02D3727:56a-18: sdom gsum de nyid rig pa yis //
T02D3727:56a-19: don de ldog pa du mas phye //
T02D3727:56a-20: khyab bya khyab byed gsungs pa la //
T02D3727:56a-21: rten dang brten par byed na 'khrul //
T02D3727:56a-22: byang sems sdom pa'i don gcig la //
T02D3727:56a-23: phan sgrub sgrub pa'i ldog pa dang //
T02D3727:56a-24: gnod spong dgag pa gnyis 'dug mod //
T02D3727:56a-25: phan sgrub ngo bo gang yin la //
T02D3727:56a-26: gnod pa spong ba khyab pas na //
T02D3727:56a-27: khyab bya khyab byed rdzas gcig tu //
T02D3727:56a-28: ba lang rdzis kyang mi go'am //
T02D3727:56a-29: des na rig 'dzin gcig pu la //
T02D3727:56a-30: gsum ldan sbyor ba 'thad ma yin //
T02D3727:56a-32: cho ga mi dgos skye bar 'gyur //
T02D3727:56a-33: sdom gsum cho ga thun mong du //
T02D3727:56a-34: thub pa chen pos gsungs pa med //
T02D3727:56a-35: phrag dog nor 'dod gti mug can //
T02D3727:56a-36: rang bzo byed pa su yis khegs //
T02D3727:56a-37: mdo rgyud spungs kyang phyogs su 'phen //
T02D3727:56a-38: sgra tshad byung na gtam gzhan sgyur ;
T02D3727:56a-39: / bstan pa'i byi dor ji ltar bya //
T02D3727:56a-40: rig 'dzin sdom pa kho na bas //
T02D3727:56a-41: gsum ldan sngags pa'i dgongs pa ni //
T02D3727:56a-42: 'bras bu'i sgo nas ma yin te //
T02D3727:56a-43: yin na kun mkhyen mchog dman 'gyur //
T02D3727:56a-44: des na lam dus gdul bya'i don //
T02D3727:56a-45: gcig dang gsum gyi khyad par dang //
T02D3727:56a-46: sdom pa rdzas chos gzhan nyams mod //
T02D3727:56a-47: gzhan yod pa yi khyad par yin //
T02D3727:56a-48: sdom gsum gang yang mi ldan na //
T02D3727:56a-49: lha mi'i lus kyang rnyed par dka' //
T02D3727:56a-50: nyams na mthong chos rnam smin gyi //
T02D3727:56a-51: rim pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya //
T02D3727:56a-52: de las so thar nyams gyur na //
T02D3727:56a-53: rang gis rang bslus gnod pa nyung //
T02D3727:56b-0: rgyal @56b dang de sras thams cad kyis //
T02D3727:56b-1: cung zad khrel gyi shin tu min //
T02D3727:56b-2: pham pa lci yang bye brag gis //
T02D3727:56b-3: lo grangs ngan song gsum du gnas //
T02D3727:56b-4: byang sems nyams na 'gro ba kun //
T02D3727:56b-5: bslus pas gnod pa shin tu mang //
T02D3727:56b-6: rgyal dang de sras thams cad dang //
T02D3727:56b-7: 'gro ba kun gyis shin tu khrel //
T02D3727:56b-8: pham pa lci yang bye brag gis //
T02D3727:56b-9: bskal pa'i grangs kyis dmyal bar gnas //
T02D3727:56b-10: rig 'dzin sdom pa nyams pas ni //
T02D3727:56b-11: yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs can //
T02D3727:56b-12: rgyal dang de sras kun brnyas bas //
T02D3727:56b-13: mi 'jig mnar med gnas dag tu //
T02D3727:56b-14: sdug bsngal chen po de yis myong //
T02D3727:56b-15: rtsa ba kun nyams phyal ba dag / gso la nye bar mi brtson na //
T02D3727:56b-16: rdo rje dmyal bar de ltung ste //
T02D3727:56b-17: dmyal ba phal ba thams cad kyi //
T02D3727:56b-18: sdug bsngal gcig tu bsdoms pa bas //
T02D3727:56b-19: de yi 'bum gyi char mi phod //
T02D3727:56b-21: se gol gcig gis phyin par byed //
T02D3727:56b-22: sangs rgyas stong gi 'od zer dang //
T02D3727:56b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i phrin las kun //
T02D3727:56b-24: rgyun du mdzad kyang phan mi 'gyur //
T02D3727:56b-25: bskal pa ther 'bum la sogs su //
T02D3727:56b-26: de ni thon par ma gsungs so //
T02D3727:56b-27: so sor thar pa'i phan yon ni //
T02D3727:56b-28: gnas skabs lha mi mthar thug gi / dgra bcom 'bras bu nges par 'thob //
T02D3727:56b-29: byang chub sems kyi phan yon ni //
T02D3727:56b-30: gnas skabs bde mang ring mo na //
T02D3727:56b-31: sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'grub //
T02D3727:56b-32: rgyas par mdo sde blta bar byos //
T02D3727:56b-33: rig 'dzin sdom pa'i phan yon ni //
T02D3727:56b-34: gnas skabs kun mkhyen bde longs spyod //
T02D3727:56b-35: gal te bsgom pa dang bcas na //
T02D3727:56b-37: ma bsgoms gyur kyang ltung med na //
T02D3727:56b-38: skye ba bcu drug nyid na'o //
T02D3727:56b-39: mkhyen brtse dung phyur ldan pa yi //
T02D3727:56b-40: phan chen blo yi rgya mtsho las //
T02D3727:56b-41: sdom gsum nor bu'i phreng ba blangs //
T02D3727:56b-42: bdag gzhan 'gro ba ma lus kyi //
T02D3727:56b-43: blo gros gtsug la legs gnas te //
T02D3727:56b-44: kun mkhyen dgos 'dod spyod par shog / rgya gar
T02D3727:56b-45: shar phyogs dz'a ga ta la'i pandi ta chen po
